comment._content: This is Admiral Cameron McRae Winslow (29 July 1854 – 2 January 1932) ref. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cameron_Winslow

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks! I see that a little more of his name appears in another Bain photo in this set ( www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2929576774/ ), as well as two more that have not yet been loaded to Flickr ( hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.15102 and hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.15010 ). We'll add more of his name in the source data and reload the description.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
OK Barbara (LOC P&P) - thank you for pointing out the other pics.

And especially going to the trouble of running it through the search of other Bain items.

Looks like you people in at LOC HQ are shedding your cloak of anonymity.
